column2: You should bleed slime... but a curse prevents this change. Slime no longer slows you down and you have higher projectile resistance.
You should bleed flammable gas... but a curse prevents this change.
You should bleed flammable oil... but a curse prevents this change. You are immune to fire.
Your blood should be replaced with cleansing Pure Liquid... but a curse prevents this change.
You should bleed salt... but a curse prevents this change. You slowly suck up nearby liquids, and take a bit less damage.
You should bleed gold... but a curse prevents this change.
You should bleed lava... but a curse prevents this change. You become immune to lava and burns, and become hydrophobic!
